title: An Herbal Mix for Allergies
author: Laura Johannes
description: A traditional Chinese herb mix called Biyan Pian is sold to clear nasal passages clogged from seasonal allergies. Aches & Claims looks at the research and talks to experts.
cleaned_text: July 20, 2009 12:01 am ET Stuffed up and miserable from allergies? A traditional Chinese mix of 11 herbs called Biyan Pian can relieve congestion and help you breathe easier, according to companies that sell it. Western scientific evidence for the formula is scant, though one recent preliminary study found it effective. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
